summary: This documentary gives insight to the lives of five ballerinas, all at different points in their careers. Looking at the operations of the Vagonova Academy and the Mariinsky Theatre, the life of a ballerina is disclosed.
cast: Taylor Ash|Altynai Asylmuratova|Diane Baker|Olga Chenchilova|Andrian Fadeyev|Valery Gergiev|Cédric Klapisch|Pierre Lacotte|Manuel Legris|Uliana Lopatkina|Olga Moiseyeva|Evguenya Obraztsova|Jayme Ratzer|Ludmila Safronova|Alina Somova|Makhar Vaziev|Diana Vishneva|Svetlana Zakharova|Igor Zelensky
title: Ballerina
